description: Police have identified the man fatally shot at 2 a.m. Saturday at a music studio in southeast Atlanta.
title: Victim identified in shooting in southeast
title_page: Atlanta News -UPDATE: Victim identified in shooting in southeast
text:
Police have identified the man fatally shot at 2 a.m. Saturday at a music studio in southeast Atlanta.
Anthony Hill Jr., 22, of Atlanta, was found dead with a gunshot wound to the head on the ground floor of the warehouse, located on the 1300 block of Lakewood Avenue, police said.
Police said a large group of people was gathered at the studio at the time of the shooting and around 12 people witnessed it, Channel 2 Action News reports. Two of them were taken in for questioning.
-Please check ajc.com for updates.
